venue_description: Established in 1983, Fox Lea Farm is a privately owned, nationally recognized horse show facility in Venice, Florida. It hosts a variety of horse shows throughout the year, attracting competitors from across the country and internationally. The showgrounds are minutes from the beaches and host more than 42 events annually, making the venue a major contributor to sports tourism in Sarasota Countyhttps://www.foxleafarm.net/#:~:text=Established%20in%201983%2C%20Fox%20Lea,Spectators%20Welcome.
formatted_address: 800 N Auburn Rd, Venice, FL 34292, USA

tone: practical, insider, authoritative (Eastern Time (ET), Florida-specific phrasing).
audience: competitive hunter/jumper riders on the A-circuit. Trainers, grooms. Prioritize limited time, convenience, and services used around horse shows.
venue_short_description: Fox Lea Farm in Venice, FL is a notable hub for A-circuit competition.
